name: Shogi Furinkazan
overview: Shogi Furinkazan is a shogi game for the Super Famicom. The term "Furinkazan" refers to a famous quote "Wind, Forest, Fire, Mountain", from Sun Tzu's Art of War (the extended version is "as swift as wind, as silent as forest, as fierce as fire, as unshakable as mountain"). It features five real-life Shogi experts, who are represented by digitized photos in-game and on the box art. As with almost all shogi games, Shogi Furinkazan was released exclusively in Japan.
